title: Tomboy And Tomgirl: Earth's Unconventional Superheroes
description: Ayla and Jonathan are a tomboy and a tomgirl living a somewhat normal life. Once they wish for superpowers, their wish is granted by the angel Gabriel, but they have to be the defenders of their world. Full of action and comedy with a dash of romance, they have a lot of evil to fight. Can they save the world and be able to enjoy their romantic times together? Let's find out!
author: Gavin Thomas
